title: mOs hOdenallO
sahitya:
mOsa hOdenallO nAnu nOsa hOdenallO


caraNam 1    shESa shayananige sEvakanAgade vAsudEvanige dAsanAgade
    caraNam 2    mallige mulle maruga davana tandu pullAbjAkSana pUjeya mADade
    caraNam 3    yauvanadalli shrI haripada nambade mUvattu varuSa mOhAbdiyalli biddu
    caraNam 4    lajje biTTu nA gajje kaTTi koNDu sajjarondige sarvadA kuNiyADe
    caraNam 5    suravara taruvAgi su-sthiravara vAdanta purandara viTTalana caraNava piDiyade
